message: I kind of find myself checking it out every other day and it just looks like same old stuff each time.
Yeah, refreshes on their product lines never seem to be quick enough. Maybe that's good in a way, keeps me out of the poorhouse.
i only launch it when it's available as a download link... otherwise, i just launch it like once a week to check for updates
I refuse to use it. Apple never displays anything that is easy to get to, searching is terrible, and it seems the larger the store gets the more of a hassle it is to use.
I find the navigation to be a bit weird, too. But it's definitely not got the nice flow of new product that the iOS App Store has. Maybe someday.
Yes. I generally only launch it if I've heard a specific app is on it.
Rarely in a need for constantly buying stuff. Only when a specific need rise, even then i use Google what i am looking for.
I find myself using regular buy and install from the web even until now. Well, except for Twitter.
